title: Insiders Buy the Holdings of MOAT ETF - Nasdaq.com
text: A look at the weighted underlying holdings of the Morningstar Wide Moat ETF ( MOAT  ) shows an impressive 17.1% of holdings on a weighted basis have experienced insider buying within the past six months.      Biogen Inc (Symbol: BIIB), which makes up 1.96% of the Morningstar Wide Moat ETF ( MOAT  ), has seen 2 directors and officers purchase shares in the past six months, according to the recent Form 4 data. The ETF holds a total of $45,966,426 worth of BIIB, making it the #28 largest holding.
